This is a slideshow displaying highlights on different school subjects

div.p: The primary mission of the staff members of Clayton Schools is to help students to develop the necessary skills and strategies to be confident life long learners and to be able to be productive in a global world. Students are our greatest assets and we will do whatever it takes to help them succeed.

p.span: Clayton School District added 7 new photos.
Mr. Cerney gives an update on COVID-19. As always, if you have any questions or concerns, please give us a call! A printed version of these questions can be found by going to...
Feature Friday! Each Friday from now until May 16th, we will feature some students from our class of 2020! Our second feature Friday is for the following students: Blake Dodge David Morgenstern...

THANK YOU for all the thank you notes! Our food service and support staff are working hard to feed all the kiddos while they are "working from home!"
Here is a great resource for families! A free downloadable book to share with children about Coronavirus. Please visit for details! #weareclayton
Jade is working hard! Even in the car!

Food Service: In an effort to make sure all lunches can be delivered before 12:00 we have made some adjustments to the three routes that deliver the almost 300 meals. Our first try with the new routes...
